name: Frostlamp Flower
description: A flower that resembles a candle lamp, commonly found near water. It emits acold, simple aroma that has a calming effect.  The contrasting colors of its stamen and stem are thought to symbolize the twodifferent types of kuuvahki, yet despite this symbolism, it is one of the fewrare plants that are immune to kuuvahki's influence. As a result, theFrostmoon Scions sometimes regard it as a symbol of faithlessness andapostasy.  It is said that this strangely shaped flower first appeared at the end of thedark calamity five hundred years ago, but this claim has never been rigorouslyverified.
